plot: Recovering from a gunshot wound, John and the team welcome two new rookies and continue the hunt for two dangerous escaped inmates.

Nolan tries to locate Bailey's ex husband Jason who along with Oscar Hutchinson escaped from prison but they are unable to. So it's back to work, Lucy is now a training officer, she's assigned to a very antsy young man while Tim is assigned a transfer who's very cocky. Wesley unintentionally learns of a detective's feelings for Angela. And the team discovers that an old use that's on its way for decommissioning was stolen and do their best to try and find it.—Rcs0411@yahoo.com
